content: dazzle berry washcloth by carolyn calderon this crochet washcloth is a nice combination of berry and single_crochet stitches to make the pretty fabric the little bobbles add to the beauty of the design pattern can be easily customized to be made bigger or smaller includes written instructions in us terminology please see pattern website for details and video tutorials thank you for your interest in my designs have a great day carolyn text and images c the purple poncho all rights reserved
